answers.author: Caitlyn Mitchell
answers.text:
The following hyperlink will take you to a neighborhood program that spefically targets four smaller neighborhoods with high crime rates. The program outlined four goals: 
1. Facilitate the participation of youth in supervied after-school activities 
2. Improve the safety of residents living in each targeted neighborhood by supporting civic engagement and active partnreships between city departments and community residents 
3. Provide children and their families with tools and stategies to address identified needs and handle conflict without resorting to violence 
4. Design a public education and media compaign to promote non-violence among youth 
The website goes into greater detail about each of the goals. The last one in particular sounds like what you are looking for. Your question is very broad so I hope this helps 
http://www.cityofboston.gov/vip/
